thread.section_title: The French Quarters Guest Apartments - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location and friendly staff
thread.title_full: Good location and friendly staff - Review of The French Quarters Guest Apartments, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: duffman316
title: Good location and friendly staff
text: On west 46th street, location is great for shows and there's many bars right on the street as well. The bourbon bar that's next door is a good time and friendly, although you will hear the bar if you're on the first couple floors. The rooms are normal size for NY, comfortable, and the staff is very friendly and helpful. All in all would probably stay again if going to a show
